name: Cowboy Team Roping
description: Cowboy Team Roping is a game that features a steer and two mounted riders, the header and the heeler. The first roper is referred to as the "header," he is the person who ropes the head of the steer, usually around the horns, the second roper is the "heeler", he ropes the steer by its hind feet. Go now and feel the experience of a real Cowboy Team Roping.
